content:
There is a canonical CodeSystem defined within the FHIR spec for SNOMED CT: http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/codesystem-snomedct.html
Is there one for LOINC?
We don't have a similar CodeSystem resource example for LOINC. But I think most of the information that you want would be here: http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/loinc.html
